channel.title: API Hashing on Journal of Connar
channel.description: Recent content in API Hashing on Journal of Connar

item.title: API Hashing - Extensive breakdown
item.description: Intro As mentioned in the Exploring PEB struct and its fields post, we will now see how to to use a technique known as API Hashing. API hashing is a technique used in malware to identify API functions by their hash value from their names or other attributes. This hash value can then be used instead of the function names or other attributes to enumerate, rehash, compare and use functions based on the hash value.
